== Examples

=== Consume CDC events

Read change events from a DynamoDB table with streams enabled.

[source,yaml]
----
input:
  aws_dynamodb_cdc:
    table: my-table
    region: us-east-1
----

=== Start from latest

Only process new changes, ignoring existing stream data.

[source,yaml]
----
input:
  aws_dynamodb_cdc:
    table: orders
    start_from: latest
    region: us-west-2
----
